sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_script_662b9d5207b4a4102001f1e08c1ed038
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Cisco CBP Rules References TM">622899de0774a4102001f1e08c1ed015</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {

	// Add your code here
	var dao = new Cisco_DAOScript();

	// CBP Rules 
	var resultCbpRules = dao.createReferences(target.bp_rule_id, "bp_rule_id", "", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_cbp_rules", false);
	if(resultCbpRules){
		target.cbp_rule = resultCbpRules + "";
		target.update();
	}

	calculatedFieldValue = dao.calculateField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cbp_rules_references","","bp_rule_id=" + target.bp_rule_id + "");
	dao.updateCalculatedField("x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_cbp_summary","bp_rule_id="+target.bp_rule_id+"","rule_references",calculatedFieldValue);

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-12-02 16:59:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>662b9d5207b4a4102001f1e08c1ed038</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onAfter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights" source="x_caci_cisco_bcs">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_662b9d5207b4a4102001f1e08c1ed038</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-12-16 12:56:53</sys_updated_on><when>onAfter</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
